table.name: out_json_profile
table.description: This table is used to store out json profile details.

columns.name: OUT_JSON_PROFILE_GID
columns.description: The globally-unique identifier for an out JSON profile.

columns.name: OUT_JSON_PROFILE_XID
columns.description: The domain-unique identifier for an out JSON profile.

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Description for the out JSON profile.

columns.name: RESOURCE_ID
columns.description: Root resource or the sub resource ID. e.g. orderReleases, orderReleases.lines or orderReleases.lines.refnums etc...

columns.name: IS_EXPAND_ALL
columns.description: Controls whether both the parent and the child resources are expanded when you query a root resource. If the value is 'N', only parent resource is expanded and links are provided for child resources.

columns.name: IS_EXPAND_REFS
columns.description: Controls whether an ID will be shown for a foreign key or there will be a URL link provided to the referenced resource.

columns.name: IS_EXPAND_REF_FULL
columns.description: Controls whether the referenced resources are fully expanded or not.
